# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #88](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#88)

#### Question

Are we going to get ten different perspectives for Gavilar's death?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You will get five.
